message.content:
Subject: Resignation from [Company Name]

Dear [Boss’s Name],

I hope this email finds you in good health and high spirits. It is with a heavy heart that I write to inform you of my decision to resign from my position at [Company Name]. After careful consideration, I have decided that it is time for me to move on to new opportunities and challenges.

I want to take this opportunity to express my sincere gratitude for the trust and support you have shown me during my tenure here. The experiences and skills I gained while working with you and your team have been invaluable, and I will always cherish them.

In order to ensure a smooth transition, I would like to offer my assistance in any way possible to help you find the best candidate for the position. I will do everything in my power to make sure that the handover process is as seamless as possible.

My last day of work at [Company Name] will be [Date], and I am committed to working diligently until then. Please let me know if there are any specific tasks or projects you would like me to complete before my departure.

Once again, thank you for your guidance and mentorship throughout the years. It has been an honor to work with such a talented and dedicated team. I wish you all the best in your future endeavors.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]
